mean_cn: n. 塞口物，随口科白，打诨，箝口物，言论，讨论终结；  v. 塞物于……的口中，禁止，使窒息，使呕吐，欺骗，作呕
mean_en: to put something (such as a piece of cloth) into or over a person's mouth in order to prevent that person from speaking, calling for help, etc.
short_phrase: gag him to keep him quiet
sentence: We gagged him with a tie so he could not scream for help!
sentence_trans: 我们拿领带塞住了他的嘴，所以他就不能呼喊求救了！
